body: Ixia was such a major character but her funding was so unclear. Also that last chapter was a masterpiece. So this is connected to Lovemare huh. The one where the MC is the only male left in the world. Neat plot.

We never saw what happened to Ixia after she escaped at the end of the first book but I understand there were too many girls to work with for the author.

daamn.. the triple show on page 69 was too much
I just want to know what happened to ixiasan. As well as those girl that gotten pregnant.
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, dont forgive me

If you read pg. 205 you will understand the end. Yuuya finally gets Jessica (Franz´ s mother) pregnant AND at the same time, population reaches 90% of male population and the anti-male virus is extended, then he dies and Jessica is taken to create the Garden as the Madam. 
PD. Jessica is crying not because she knew he´ s going to die but because she could´nt get pregnant (the bracelet is white until the end).

So jessica fucked yuuya -yuuya got her pregnant and that flipped the 89% to90% and she ist the mom of Iris/Franz? Whoa pretty deep shit here but storry +art a clear 12/10 so thx for reading my comment
Okay.. Welp, that was a pretty dark turn. Enjoyed it enough though despite that last half and the ending.
